channel.title: Home on Market Station Apartments Greensboro, NC
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Market Station Apartments Greensboro, NC

item.title: Apply
item.description: Apply below for available units at Market Station apartments: When applying to rent at Market Station Apartments please be prepared to provide: Social Security Card Driver’s License or other Government Photo ID Proof of Employment and your 2 most recent Paystubs Non-refundable Applicant fee via Credit or Debit Card A separate application is required for each potential resident over the age of 17
